product_name: The North Face Striped Glacier Full-Zip Hoodie - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Perfect over a T-shirt or under a rain jacket, The North Face Striped Glacier Full-Zip hoodie keeps girls cozy in a lightweight layer of soft polyester fleece with a touch of colorful style. Durable brushed surface resists pilling. Hand pockets on The North Face Striped Glacier Full-Zip Hoodie for girls keep her fingers warm when she doesn't want to wear her mittens. Closeout.
